Line 6: Line 5:
'''Ewido Networks''' is a software company based in [[Germany]] known for creating Ewido Anti-Spyware. Ewido Anti-Spyware is a software used to remove malware, like spyware, trojans, adware, dialers, and worms. It also features real-time protection, automatic updates, and other privacy features. Ewido has both a free version, and a paid version which adds realtime protection, and automatic updates.
'''Ewido Networks''' is a software company based in [[Germany]] known for creating Ewido Anti-Spyware. Ewido Anti-Spyware is a software used to remove malware, like spyware, trojans, adware, dialers, and worms. It also features real-time protection, automatic updates, and other privacy features. Ewido has both a free version, and a paid version which adds realtime protection, and automatic updates.
==History==
==History==
â
Ewido networks was founded in Germany in 2004 by Andreas Rudyk, Peter Klapprodt and Tobias Graf. Their first product was Ewido Security Suite. Ewido was given Digital River's ICE award for "Best newcomer of the year".{Fact|date=March 2008}}
+
Ewido networks was founded in Germany in 2004 by Andreas Rudyk, Peter Klapprodt and Tobias Graf. Their first product was Ewido Security Suite. Ewido was given Digital River's ICE award for "Best newcomer of the year".{{Fact|date=March 2008}}
